wordpressPage.title: Quotations
wordpressPage.content:
The trouble with life is there’s no background music

– Anonymous

I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

– Thomas Jefferson

Dream is not that which you see while sleeping it is something that does not let you sleep.

– A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

The fragility of moments is what makes them infinitely more valuable.

– a friend

Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didnâ€™t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sailaway from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.

– Mark Twain

All great undertakings are achieved through mighty obstacles.

-Swami Vivekananda

Some moments are too indefinable to be constrained by a mere permutation of the alphabet.

– a friend
